The party never ends at Nether-Land. Dance all night with killer beats from our deadly cool DJs!

#UniversalStudiosSingapore #RWSMoments #HalloweenHorrorNights12 #HalloweenHorrorNights #USSHHN #Vacation #ThemePark #BestDayEver #SingaporeAttractions #VisitSingapore #ExploreSingapore

Every year, I attended Halloween Horror Nights, dreaming of one day becoming a scare actor. This year, my darkest dream came true! For the first time, I stepped backstage at Universal Studios Singapore, where I not only learned tips on how to be a scare actor but also got to put them into practice by successfully scaring guests in the immersive 3D haunted house, Cursed Scrolls: Dynasty of Darkness. It felt like I was living in my own horror movie! I had an absolute blast and enjoyed every moment. 

@rwsentosa @universalstudiossingapore #HalloweenHorrorNights12 #RWSmoments #UniversalStudiosSingapore

Wanna hang out with Jackson Wang at a private party? This is your chance! ğŸŸï¸ğŸ‘»

ğŸ“¸ How to enter:

1. Visit Universal Studios Singapore Halloween Horror Nights on 10 or 11 October and snap your spookiest photo at the Under the Castle haunted house photo backdrop!

2. Follow @UniversalStudiosSingapore and @teamwangdesign.

3. Post your most creative shot on your public IG feed, tag us, and use the hashtag #HHN12UnderTheCastle

4. In your caption, tell us why you want to party with Jackson Wang!
 
5 lucky winners will get 1 invitation each to a private party with Jackson Wang at @AdventureCoveWaterparkSG on the 13 Oct!

Contest ends on 11th Oct at 11:59 PM. Winners will be contacted via Instagram DM on 12 Oct.

Our Frights for Four package just got scarier.

Enjoy early entry into the park and be the first to experience select haunted houses and rides before the crowd. Plus, fuel up with an exclusive set meal to keep your energy up for all the scares ahead.

From 13 September, get into the Halloween spirit with daytime thrills, meet and greets, and festive fun for everyone. Join us for a day of hauntingly good fun! ğŸƒ

#linkinbio

#UniversalStudiosSingapore #RWSMoments #Vacation #ThemePark #BestDayEver #SingaporeAttractions #VisitSingapore #ExploreSingapore

Be careful of your surroundings...

Starting 27 September, find out what lurks in the dark at Universal Studios Singapore Halloween Horror Nights 12. Tickets on sale now. #linkinbio

Make your OOTD look instantly cool with this easy photography tip.

Follow these steps:
- Shoot using the LIVE mode on your handphone camera 
- Go to gallery and tap into your photo
- Choose 'Long Exposure' instead of 'LIVE'

Viola! The people moving in the background will be blurred out.

comments: [('kuncoromeyvita', 'In universal studio singapore?'), ('kuncoromeyvita', 'Is there Mario bross rides'), ('xuan.cyxuan', 'Joined! ğŸ¥°â¤ï¸ thanks for hosting this super fun giveaway and hope to win the lovely merch for my nephew who loves the movie a lot too!!! #teamyoshi FTW!!ğŸ™ŒğŸ™Œ @universalstudiossingapore lots more fun times soon when the new attractions open!!!â¤ï¸'), ('itz_munmuni_revived', 'Have a similar experience as @hellomslinzx , even with the express pass we couldnâ€™t get to all of the rides and the wait time was almost 100 mins in most of the rides , we could find our lost photos from the Shrek meet and greet and the Universal studio app for photo retrieval is not working at all to put a request through . We submitted our feedbackâ€™s but never received the emails to collect the goodie bags . Also the tax refund from the store remains unclaimed . The opening hours and the turnaround time is something you have to work on ! @universalstudiossingapore'), ('hellomslinzx', 'Hi universal studios, we just got back from USS and we had a blazin time. However, I would like to express my disappointment on behalf of my 2 little kids. It was a very hot day and we showed up early to be in line hoping to beat the queues. My kids were super excited. However each ride was around 45-80 mins queue time (we did not purchase express cards). I tried my best to rush them from one ride to another but as you know we need to pause, eat, hydrate plus that very hot day took a toll on my kids. However the message that I want to convey is - can you extend your park hours ? We did not have time to go on most of the rides and itâ€™s really disappointing that the park is only open for 7 hours. Most big parks are open for 10-12 hours. With the short opening hours , it did not give us much time to take a break, dine properly nor shop for any merchandise at your park. I really hope you consider to extend or review your operating hours so as not to disappoint your visitors. Just a message from a normal mom !')]
